entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -12.6°C

Visibility: 6.4 km

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
